target_name: By 2030, reduce the global maternal mortality ratio to less than 70 per 100,000 live births
computation_definitions:
National data (Type1)
This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators.
Download the national metadata file for more information.

indicator_definition: Percentage of multiparous women aged 15~49 with a live birth attended by a skilled health personnel
computation_calculations: Surveys of married women aged 15-49 nationwide with a live birth in the past two years.
